sessions.description:
Use this time to organize your groups, read through the brief for the session and delegate roles (and sub teams if you think you will need them)

Start to work on creating your backlog with this being a mixture of usser stories and more informal notes

Finalise any stories that you are taking into the sprint to carry out

Delegate stories to individuals / groups

Development Team: Do the work

Scrum Master: Make sure people are able to get on with their tasks, help out where needed

Product Owner: Develop mre stories from the brief. Refine stories not brought into sprints

This should be led by your ScrumMaster
